title: How do you account for McCarthyism

content.question: How do you account for the appeal of McCarthyism in the United States in the era following the Second World War.

frqParts.text: How do you account for the appeal of McCarthyism in the United States in the era following the Second World War.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
